document.full_text: jason giambi became the second-oldest player to hit three home runs in a game and tied his career high with seven runs batted in, leading the colorado rockies past the philadelphia phillies, 7-1, on thursday.
document.title: baseball roundup: giambi, 40 and scuffling, hits 3 homers against the phillies
lines_and_colors: jason giambi became the second-oldest player to hit three home runs in a game and tied his career high with seven runs batted in, leading the colorado rockies past the philadelphia phillies, 7-1, on thursday.
